entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear before morning. Blowing snow at times before morning. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
